output_list.vulnerability: Transfer can be manipulated to transfer more tokens than it actually should.
output_list.reason: If a malicious user knows the address of another user, they can transfer tokens to that address and gain an unfair advantage.

output_list.vulnerability: The function doesn't check if the caller is the owner of the token.
output_list.reason: This allows a malicious user to approve another user to spend tokens that they should not be able to.
